properties.name: Anette's Chocolates
properties.description: Posted by Mamamisty 1321 First Street Napa, CA 94559If you find yourself in the Napa Valley make sure to visit here. They have wonderful truffles, ice cream and a coffee bar. Be sure and try the Mini Winter Cabernet Truffles.... Tastes like Heaven!

properties.name: Bistro Burger
properties.description: Posted by Mamamisty201 Mission St Ste 110, San Francisco CAWe went here for lunch. I had a Pineapple Cheeseburger that rocked socks! Very well done.

properties.name: Bounty Hunter Wine Bar
properties.description: Posted by Mamamisty975 First Street Napa, CA 94559What a great place to go on a date, or with some girlfriends. They have a wonderful selection of wines by the bottle and by the glass, plus they serve some nice dishes to compliment the wines. Not really a place to go to dinner, but you may want to stay all night. Sit on the saddle and talk to a stranger... trust me.

properties.name: Copia
properties.description: Posted by Mamamisty  At Copia they have classes, exhibits and lots of great stuff to try. Not to mention the beautiful gardens. A great place to unwind or to brush up on your wine knowledge. There is also a restaurant onsite (Julia\'s Kitchen) which serves good food, but in my opinion is overpriced and the servers are somewhat pretentious. Play here, eat somewhere else! If you\'re around in February you have to catch the Death by Chocolate exhibit.

properties.name: Ghirardelli Square
properties.description: Posted by Mamamisty 900 North Point St., San Francisco, CA, United StatesThis is my favorite date place. Very romantic at night. Long line, and very tourist-y. Split a sundae and then walk around the beautifully lit grounds.

properties.name: Gillwoods Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Mamamisty 1320 Napa Town Center Napa, CA 94559This is my favorite spot for breakfast in Napa. Their blueberry muffins are too good, and their breakfast are super yummy. My favorite here is the Greek scramble, hold olives, add mushrooms with a side of fruit and a blueberry muffin. It also has a nice outdoor seating area nestled in with some cute shops.

properties.name: Milbrae Pancake House
properties.description: Posted by MamamistyThis place is AWESOME! Friday\'s Special is Blueberry Pancakes with eggs and sausage or bacon for .99! Home cookin\' style. Yummy.

properties.name: Milbrae Pancake House
properties.description: Posted by Mamamisty1301 El Camino Real Milbrae, CA 94030

properties.name: Milbrae Pancake House
properties.description: Posted by MamamistyLocation

properties.name: Milbrae Pancake House, Milbrae, CA
properties.description: Posted by MamamistyMilbraeThis place is AWESOME! Good home cooked breakfast, good service, good price. Friday\'s Special is Blueberry Pancakes, eggs & bacon or sausage for .99... WTF!?! So good!
